# UICloudSharingController.PermissionOptions

**Structure**

A set of options that determine the permission options available to the user when viewing the Cloud sharing controller screens.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PermissionOptions
```

## Overview

These options are used when setting the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController/availablePermissions] property on the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController] instance. This property determines which permission options are presented to the user in the controller’s user interface.

## Constants

- **allowPublic**: The option that grants access to anyone who has the share link.
- **allowPrivate**: The option that restricts access to people who have been invited.
- **allowReadOnly**: The option that gives participants read-only permission to the shared data.
- **allowReadWrite**: The option that gives participants read/write permission to the shared data.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new permission option set with the given raw integer value.

## Configuring the permissions

- **availablePermissions**: A combination of permission and access options made available to the user when viewing screens presented by the CloudKit sharing controller.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
